BasicInfo.short: PopTalk is a free over-the-top carrier that provides free calls, texts and pre-paid data powered by mobile advertising.

Products.name: PopTalk
Products.description: PopTalk provides free international calls, texts, and pre-paid data, all powered by mobile advertising.

news.title: New POPTALK Application to Launch Just in Time for the Holidays Allowing Android Users to Call and Text Their Families in Mexico and Latin America for FREE
Nueva Aplicación POPTALK se lanza justo a tiempo para las fiestas, permitiendo que usuarios de teléfonos Android puedan llamar y enviar textos GRATIS a familiares en México y Latinoamérica
